name: Berry Good Sandwich
author: Ethel
summary: This is a wonderful springtime treat for kids of all ages. A simple spread of Neufchatel cheese and strawberry jam and fresh chopped strawberries is the easy filling for this sandwich. Many variations are possible - blueberries and blueberry jam, apricots and apricot jam, etc...
directions: In a small bowl, mix together Neufchatel cheese and strawberry jam
Spread strawberry flavored cheese spread over one slice of bread
Top with chopped strawberries and remaining slice of bread to make a sandwich
Remove crusts, and cut into triangles to serve
